Room.Name: Bendine Way/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hofton Avenue and Bendine Way.
Room.LongDescription: Hofton Way runs east and west from the intersection, running parallel to the northern City Walls. Bendine Way heads south out of the intersection through many of the more popular shops and facilities lining both sides of the road. On the southeast corner of the intersection is the Red-Eye Pub and Grill Stage, where various bards and other minstrels come to perform before live audiences.
